void thread_queue_enqueue ( struct thread_queue *const   queue_ptr,
const int  thread_index 
)

Enqueue one thread into the thread queue.

The thread will be placed at the end of the queue.

Parameters:
queue_ptr Points to the thread queue.
thread_index Index, into thread_table, of the thread to be inserted into the thread queue.
